A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi expands the Star Wars Universe into a new era. \nI liked the risks they take\, I definitely want to watch it a second time. When things don't happen the way fans expect them\, that is not a bad thing. The same people who  accuse The Force Awakens of being an imitation of the New Hope accuse the Last Jedi of being \"not starwars\". please decide!
